[[File:METW - Advertisement.jpg: '''Middle-earth: The Wizards''' (METW), released in [[1995]], was the first basic set for the ''[[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]''.
METW deals with the ''good'' side, and includes most of main characters from the books, like [[Gandalf]], [[Frodo Baggins
thumb: Frodo]] and [[Aragorn]]. The set features a pretty straightforward gameplay with relatively simple ''marshalling point'' cards and ''hazard creatures''.

[[File:METW - Advertisement.jpg: METW was sold in starters and boosters (no cards from other sets were needed to play). A booster (15 cards, 36 boosters per display) held 1 rare, 3 uncommons, and 11 commons. A starter held a fixed set (at random), 3
R: rare; U: uncommon; C: common; F: fixed
CA1: once on general common sheet; CA2: twice on general common sheet; CB1: once on booster-only common sheet; CB2: twice on
F#: in # different fixed sets (out of 5).
